name: Meeting place of council
text:
PART I.  GENERAL JURISDICTION AND POWERS

Cross References

  Emergency preparedness, see §125C-32.
  Jurisdiction over real property taxation, see State Constitution, Article VIII, §3 and chapter 246A.
     All meetings, regular or special, of the council may be held at such places within the county other than the county seat as the council shall designate. [L 1963, c 19, §1; Supp, §138-50; HRS ]
Cross References

  Emergency seat of government, see §§130-3, 130-4.
